sub_topic: Prove that the Cartesian product of two sets is not commutative with respect to union.
message_1: Let A = {1, 2} and B = {3, 4}. Find (A x B) U (B x A) and (B x A) U (A x B). Show that the results are not equal, hence proving that the Cartesian product of two sets is not commutative with respect to union.
